title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
author: J. R. R. Tolkien
review: An epic tale of hobbits, wizards, and a perilous journey to destroy the One Ring.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
review: A witty and insightful social commentary about love and marriage in 19th century England.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
review: A powerful story about racial injustice and the importance of empathy, seen through the eyes of a young girl.

title: One Hundred Years of Solitude
author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez
review: A magical realist masterpiece that explores the rise and fall of a family and a town over generations.

title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
author: Douglas Adams
review: A hilarious science fiction comedy about a man who escapes Earth's destruction with his friend, a two-headed alien, and a towel.

title: Frankenstein
author: Mary Shelley
review: A gothic novel about a scientist who creates a monstrous being and the consequences of his ambition.
